If you have installed this app on your ubntu and after it asks for your cell phone to connect and the app wouldn't load then this is for you. Go to Ubuntu software and then go to Installed apps and then click on viber-mtd. Now, click on Permissions and then enable all options there. Now try to open viber again. Thank me later.
